name: Schedule 15N-Deception Technology for Advanced Threat Detection

messages.speech: Year 2017 was a record-breaking year for serious security breaches with over 5000 reported breaches and nearly 8 billion compromised information records. Many enterprise breaches are carried out using credentials or data that are socially engineered or stolen. This talk will cover Deception Technology – “Motion Detectors for the Enterprise”. Agenda: - Introduction to Deception technology - Weaving in deception into the network and security fabric using AI - Autonomously weaving a deception web when hackers gain access - Efficacy of Deception - Success stories that have prevented massive breaches. How else can I help you ?
